content.rendered: [vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” css_animation=”fadeIn” css=”.vc_custom_1588727897214{background-color: #f5f4f2 !important;}”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1592751548245{padding-top: 0px !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”16227″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center” css=”.vc_custom_1593817515573{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css_animation=”none” css=”.vc_custom_1593050786470{margin-top: 40px !important;margin-bottom: 40px !important;}” el_id=”overview”][vc_column width=”1/4″ css=”.vc_custom_1592524565715{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;}”][vc_btn title=”Login to LMS” style=”3d” color=”danger” size=”lg” align=”center” button_block=”true” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Flms.sdbi.in||target:%20_blank|rel:nofollow” el_class=”mkb-btn-sdbi mkb-full-btn-fnt”][vc_column_text el_class=”txt-center fnt-small”]*Login only for SDBI students[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”3/4″ css=”.vc_custom_1592525599661{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-left: 30px !important;}”][vc_column_text]The digitization happening across global education necessitates a smart learning platform to compliment classroom teaching. LMS provides a reliable, secure, flexible, and scalable solution for the continuous guidance and helps us in maximising our curriculum effectiveness. With a customizable platform which allows creation of study material, continuous assessments, feedback, academic timetable, it immensely contributes in making students’ engagement high.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css_animation=”fadeInUp” css=”.vc_custom_1609371881899{background-color: #f5f5f5 !important;}” el_id=”highlights” el_class=”mb_grey_bg”][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”Providing a comprehensive learning experience for our students” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”red-hdln”][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”top” css=”.vc_custom_1592917295641{margin-top: 60px !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_custom_heading text=”Revisit Classroom Sessions” font_container=”tag:h4|font_size:20px|text_align:center|line_height:30px” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_single_image image=”16109″ img_size=”full” alignment=”right” style=”vc_box_rounded”][vc_column_text el_class=”txt-justify”]LMS is used to provide structured course content in the forms of notes, PPT, quizzes and video links. Our faculty uploads notes and assignments on LMS on a regular basis as the classroom sessions progress. This ensures a smooth learning curve where students can access and re-use the study material whenever they want.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_custom_heading text=”Online Assessment” font_container=”tag:h4|font_size:20px|text_align:center|line_height:30px” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_single_image image=”16111″ img_size=”full” alignment=”right” style=”vc_box_rounded”][vc_column_text el_class=”txt-justify”]LMS enables our faculty to assess students based on assignments, tests and quizzes through online submissions. It enables tracking students’ progress conveniently and facilitates online communication between students and teachers. Students’ exchange of feedback both with teachers and their peers is also done through LMS.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_custom_heading text=”Tracking day-to-day activities” font_container=”tag:h4|font_size:20px|text_align:center|line_height:30px” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_single_image image=”16110″ img_size=”full” alignment=”right” style=”vc_box_rounded”][vc_column_text el_class=”txt-justify”]Attendance management is integrated on LMS where students and teachers can view and record attendance. Weekly events, newsletters, Circulars and timetables are shared via LMS. It also enables teachers to modify and update the content regularly so that students always have access to the updated material.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_section][vc_row][vc_column][vc_btn title=”Student Guide on Live Lectures” shape=”square” color=”danger” size=”lg” align=”center” button_block=”true” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fsdbi.in%2Fstudent-guide-on-live-lectures%2F|title:Student%20Guide%20on%20Live%20Lectures|target:_blank” el_class=”lecture”][/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section]
